Author: Youngbraz

Comment: I was a dispatch supervisor and some could make overtime around $42-52$ per hour. Happened a lot during Covid holiday season. The drivers would eat up any overtime they could get. Corporate tried to clamp down where they could but the higher seniority drivers made way more than me who was essentially 2nd to the OM of the center.  Average high seniority driver makes 80-100k per year depending on seniority while I was there.  That’s the typical brown truck driver
